title: Help with .OTF font in Flash
content: Hey, i'm tryin to use Trajan Pro in flash but it's not working. I noticed it's a .otf file but I don't know what that is. It works in every other program but not flash and i'm on a time crunch here. Am I missing something?
author: wyclef

comments.content: dude, can you just tell me what format to convert it to instead of trying to charge me?
Not sure what voices are speaking to you but I would try converting it to truetype.
